Uses of Package
net.java.jddac.jmci.units

Packages that use net.java.jddac.jmci.units
net.java.jddac.jmci.lib Provides the measurement calculus library classes for the Java Measurement Calculus Interface (JMCI). 
net.java.jddac.jmci.units Provides support for a higher-level package to perform arithmetic on machine-readable representations of physical quantities. 
 

Classes in net.java.jddac.jmci.units used by net.java.jddac.jmci.lib
Unit
          A physical unit, such as horsepower.
 

Classes in net.java.jddac.jmci.units used by net.java.jddac.jmci.units
ConversionException
          Signals that a problem of some sort has occurred either when creating a converter between two units or during the conversion itself.
Converter
           This class represents a converter of numeric values.
Dimension
          The type of a physical quantity, such as length.
Unit
          A physical unit, such as horsepower.
UnitFormatter
          This class provides the interface for formatting and parsing units.
